summary: Project to adjust UI character preview box so the character is perfectly centered and not clipped in the display frame.
known_issues: Character is not centered in the character preview box; head gets cut off by the display frame.

existing_features.title: Update the Character Dock preview box UI frame so the 3D character appears perfectly centered within the preview box and is not clipped (including the head) by the box/frame.

Adjust the Character Dock canvas container styling/layout to ensure consistent centering and safe framing (e.g., padding/safe-area within the preview box, appropriate fixed/min height, and overflow handling) so the 3D canvas has enough vertical space to display the full character.

new_feature_requests.summary: Reposition/adjust the character preview box UI frame so the character is perfectly centered and not cut off.

projectName: Center the character within the Character Dock preview box (prevent head clipping)
